name: @orillusion/physics
author: Orillusion
description: Orillusion Physics Plugin, Powerd by Ammo.js

scripts.build: vite build && npm run build:types && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:clean: mv dist/packages/physics/* dist && rm -rf dist/src && rm -rf dist/packages
scripts.docs:typedoc: npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --tsconfig tsconfig.json --gitRevision main --hideBreadcrumbs true --allReflectionsHaveOwnDocument true --readme none --excludeInternal --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --sort source-order --out
